name: Blamdown: Udder Fury
description: Blamdown: Udder Fury is a fast-paced twin stick shooter about a cow with a bazooka and a lust for revenge. It's all about creating chaos, blowing stuff up and having a fun. Jump on top of buildings, gun down enemy jetpack-troopers and blast away tanks with your trusty bazooka!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or greater (64-bit) Processor: 3 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
